𓅽 Ba bird bard Bote

Harbinger Bringer

Ba’s were the souls of the deceased: birds acting as singing 𓅓messanger Sänger angles(Boten).

___ 𓎻𓅡𓏱 Mind

⇔ Pharaoh Horus Ba = Horus Bird

Often conflated with
𓅢 Power frawahr@Persia po’work 𓂓 𓅡𓎡𓅂 𓅢 Ba Wow 𓅨 pāo 🏐
